005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.ModuleUtils;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014/**
015 * Represents an arbitrary grouping of Metaschema model instances.
016 */
017public interface INamedModelInstanceGrouped extends INamedModelInstance {
018  @Override
019  IChoiceGroupInstance getParentContainer();
020
021  @Override
022  default IAssemblyDefinition getContainingDefinition() {
023    return getParentContainer().getContainingDefinition();
024  }
025
026  /**
027   * Get the discriminator JSON property name to use to identify the type of a
028   * given instance object.
029   *
030   * @return the discriminator property name or {@code null} if the effective name
031   *         should be used instead
032   */
033  @Nullable
034  String getDiscriminatorValue();
035
036  /**
037   * Get the effective discriminator JSON property name to use to identify the
038   * type of a given instance object.
039   *
040   * @return the discriminator property name
041   */
042  @NonNull
043  default String getEffectiveDisciminatorValue() {
044    String retval = getDiscriminatorValue();
045    if (retval == null) {
046      retval = getEffectiveName();
047    }
048    return retval;
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  @Nullable
053  default IFlagInstance getEffectiveJsonKey() {
054    return JsonGroupAsBehavior.KEYED.equals(getParentContainer().getJsonGroupAsBehavior())
055        ? ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(getJsonKey())
056        : null;
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  @Nullable
061  default IFlagInstance getJsonKey() {
062    String name = getParentContainer().getJsonKeyFlagInstanceName();
063    return name == null
064        ? null
065        : ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
066            getDefinition().getFlagInstanceByName(
067                ModuleUtils.parseFlagName(getContainingModule(), name).getIndexPosition()));
068  }
069
070  @Override
071  default int getMinOccurs() {
072    return getParentContainer().getMinOccurs();
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  default int getMaxOccurs() {
077    return getParentContainer().getMaxOccurs();
078  }
079
080}
